-COLLECTION: collect exclusive World Cup cards.

-CALENDAR: find all the matches of all groups, round of 16, quarter-finals, semi-final and the final.

-PRONOSTICS: make your predictions on the matches and determine who will be the winner of the match.

-THE TEAMS: find the team files, their achievements, the results and the statistics of the matches played during the cup.
